DataSource.Query: SELECT purchase.quotations.quotation_id, account.users.name AS entered_by, purchase.quotations.value_date, purchase.quotations.expected_delivery_date, core.offices.office_name, purchase.quotations.terms, purchase.quotations.cancelled, purchase.quotations.internal_memo, inventory.suppliers.supplier_name, purchase.quotations.taxable_total, purchase.quotations.discount, purchase.quotations.tax_rate, purchase.quotations.tax, COALESCE(purchase.quotations.taxable_total, 0) + COALESCE(purchase.quotations.tax, 0) - COALESCE(purchase.quotations.discount, 0) AS sub_total, purchase.quotations.nontaxable_total, COALESCE(purchase.quotations.taxable_total, 0) + COALESCE(purchase.quotations.tax, 0) + COALESCE(purchase.quotations.nontaxable_total, 0) - COALESCE(purchase.quotations.discount, 0) AS total FROM purchase.quotations INNER JOIN core.offices ON purchase.quotations.office_id = core.offices.office_id INNER JOIN account.users ON purchase.quotations.user_id = account.users.user_id LEFT JOIN inventory.suppliers ON purchase.quotations.supplier_id = inventory.suppliers.supplier_id WHERE purchase.quotations.quotation_id=@quotation_id;

SELECT inventory.items.item_code, inventory.items.item_name, purchase.quotation_details.price, purchase.quotation_details.quantity, inventory.units.unit_name, ROUND(purchase.quotation_details.price * purchase.quotation_details.quantity, 4) AS amount, purchase.quotation_details.discount, purchase.quotation_details.shipping_charge, ROUND((purchase.quotation_details.price * purchase.quotation_details.quantity) - purchase.quotation_details.discount + purchase.quotation_details.shipping_charge, 4) AS total FROM purchase.quotation_details INNER JOIN inventory.items ON purchase.quotation_details.item_id = inventory.items.item_id INNER JOIN inventory.units ON purchase.quotation_details.unit_id = inventory.units.unit_id WHERE purchase.quotation_details.quotation_id = @quotation_id ORDER BY purchase.quotation_details.quotation_detail_id;
